name: Wahoo Fitness Elemnt Bolt Aerodynamic Out Front Mount
categories: Mounts and sensors for bike computers
Elemnt Bolt Aerodynamic Out Front Mount
description: Streamline your cockpit with this aero mount. This aerodynamic mount is sculpted and engineered to reduce drag. It comes with an optional locking screw for UCI compliant weigh-ins.Works with Wahoo ELEMNT BOLT computers.Fits 31.8mm round bars.
